title: Quicksolve Whodunit Puzzles: Challenging Mini-Mysteries
description: Help Dr. J. L. Quicksolve solve murders, burglaries, frauds, kidnappings, and other mysteries. Was the bank teller Miss Pettithief the victim or the perpetrator of a robbery? Who poisoned Betty Finn--her husband or best friend Mary Scapegoat? By reading each delightfully illustrated quick-solve puzzle carefully, paying attention to detail and what people say, you'll be able to catch the crooks just as quickly as the ace detective, and you'll have a lot of fun doing it! 96 pages, 5 3/8 x 8 1/4.
author: Jim Sukach
